about_the_game:
GAME THEME
How far will humanity go in its pursuit of survival and expansion, and at what cost?
The game's theme, influenced by acclaimed titles like Princess Mononoke and Final Fantasy VII, delves into the conflict between Humans and Corruption, a demonic embodiment of human greed.


Tower Forge: Dark Defense is an epic medieval dark fantasy RTS tower defense PC game that offers high-quality visuals and deep gameplay mechanics. You'll be engaged for dozens of hours, experiencing the thrill of the battlefield and the satisfaction of strategic victory.



USE ENVIRONMENT AS WEAPON
You can use the terrain to your advantage, turning even the toughest of foes into a tactical advantage. However, be cautious — the map is expanding, providing new grounds for you to defend! Build your defense structures high on hills to expand its range, exploit choke points or slowing effects of rivers.


CRAFT DEADLY TOWERS
The game's unique tower crafting system provides a fresh and exciting challenge with each playthrough, offering replay value that strategy and tactics enthusiasts would appreciate. Collect rare resources during gameplay to craft your own unique towers with special abilities that cater to your playstyle. The only limit is your imagination — construct the deadliest towers of all!


ROGUELITE CAMPAIGN
You have 10 turns to complete your war campaign against the corruption plague. Choose your path wisely as each has its own obstacles, challenges and rewards. Failure could be lethal! The fate of the entire kingdom rests in your hands. Tailor your tower deck to perfectly suit the chosen path, exploit terrain and tower synergies to reach the goal — annihilation of the corrupted foes.

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10

  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 SUPER
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
